views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8 - 12

PokeGO Team gif Lock Screen animation!

Options Included:
- ON/OFF Switch
- Custom GIF
- Scale To Fit Screen
- Transparent BG
- LockScreen Time
- Enable HomeScreen (iOS 10 and 11)
- Transparent Dock (iOS 10 and 11)
- Custom Gifs Editing (a place to select Custom GIF)

- Portrait only support. (iPad is buggy)

Note: If it is a big size GIF image it will crash

Configure options from Settings.

Support for arm64e v1.0-6
Support for Xen HTML home screen on iOS 10 and 11
v1.0-5
Added: Enable HomeScreen, Transparent Dock (iOS 10 and 11)
Added: Custom Gifs Editing (a place to select Custom GIF)

Note: If it is a big size GIF image it will crash
v1.0-4
Remove: Sustain LockScreen option (for iOS 10)
Added: LockScreen Time option (for iOS 10)
v1.0-3
Support: iOS 10.1.x
Add: Sustain LockScreen option (for iOS 10)
v1.0-2
Fix: Minor Issue

v1.0-1
Added Options
- ON/OFF Switch
- Custom GIF
- Scale To Fit Screen
- Transparent BG
- LockScreen Time
